name: Minimal Mangadex (Legacy) - Portrait
description:
Intended for monitors in portrait orientation, remove everything but the meat. Only displays the manga pages, and minimal navigation links!

* ONLY WORKS IN LEGACY VIEW AT THE MOMENT *
additional_info:
This is still a work-in-progress, but wanted this uploaded so I can run it on multiple setups of mine.

*There are slight issues with navigation and your window is smaller than a certain size. Suggest 1. Disabling script doing whatever kind of navigation you need, then re-enable or 2. Just clicking the Mangadex in top left to go to home page, do whatever you need since style isn't applied to home page, then go back to reading.
